original_title: 木枯し紋次郎　関わりござんせん
overview: Monjiro, reunited with his long lost sister, is pursued by a yakuza gang because he killed their boss. He also meets a fellow gambler who idolizes Monjiro. The gambler and Monjiro's sister are pulled into a conspiracy to get to Monjiro, but do things go as planned?
title: Kogarashi Monjiro 2: Secret of Monjiro's Birth
